verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:1
verses.text: Dare any of you, having a matter against another, go to law before the unjust, and not before the saints?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:2
verses.text: Do ye not know that the saints shall judge the world? and if the world shall be judged by you, are ye unworthy to judge the smallest matters?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:3
verses.text: Know ye not that we shall judge angels? how much more things that pertain to this life?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:4
verses.text: If then ye have judgments of things pertaining to this life, set them to judge who are least esteemed in the church.
